fields.label: Data Context Mapping
fields.name: ccai__AI_Data_Extraction_Mapping__c

fields.inlineHelpText:
Choose locale for Flows, Mass Processing, and APIs, affecting date, time, and number formats.

Company Default: Applies standard locale for consistent automated formatting.
Record Owner's Locale: Adopts record owner's settings for personalized formatting.
fields.label: Locale - Automation
fields.name: ccai__AI_Locale_Automation__c

fields.inlineHelpText:
Set locale for the GPTfy console, affecting date, time, and number formats.

Active User: Uses current user's locale for a personalized experience.
Company Default: Applies standard organization locale for consistency.
fields.label: Locale - GPTfy Console
fields.name: ccai__AI_Locale_GPTfy_Console__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This category focuses on the style, clarity, and organization of responses. It includes guidelines on language usage, adherence to local conventions, and the structure of the response to ensure it is clear, direct, and easily understandable. These guidelines help in maintaining a professional and coherent communication style that enhances the effectiveness and accessibility of the information provided.
fields.label: Grounding - Content
fields.name: ccai__Grounding_Content__c

picklistValues.label: Address all parts of a multi-part question.
picklistValues.value: Address all parts of a multi-part question.

picklistValues.label: Avoid using absolutes, such as "always" or "never".
picklistValues.value: Avoid using absolutes, such as "always" or "never".

picklistValues.label: Avoid using slang or colloquial terms unless specifically asked.
picklistValues.value: Avoid using slang or colloquial terms unless specifically asked.

picklistValues.label: Only answer what has been asked for.
picklistValues.value: Only answer what has been asked for.

picklistValues.label: Ensure all records are shown in the tables.
picklistValues.value: Ensure all records are shown in the tables.

picklistValues.label: Include border="1" in all HTML table tags
picklistValues.value: Include border="1" in all HTML table tags

picklistValues.label: Add captions to each HTML table.
picklistValues.value: Add captions to each HTML table.

picklistValues.label: Prioritize quality over speed in responses.
picklistValues.value: Prioritize quality over speed in responses.

picklistValues.label: Convert all internal CSS to inline CSS for the response.
picklistValues.value: Convert all internal CSS to inline CSS for the response.

picklistValues.label: Use the following inline CSS for table header 'th' style="background-color: #e1ebf7 color: #16325  padding: 0.5rem text-align: left"
picklistValues.value: Use the following inline CSS for table header 'th' style="background-color: #e1ebf7 color: #16325  padding: 0.5rem text-align: left"

picklistValues.label: Use the following inline CSS for caption = "font-size: 1.0rem font-weight: bold padding: 0.5rem color: #5C5C5C text-align: left"
picklistValues.value: Use the following inline CSS for caption = "font-size: 1.0rem font-weight: bold padding: 0.5rem color: #5C5C5C text-align: left"

picklistValues.label:
Dont add any '\n' characters in your HTML. Replace each '\n' with the HTML line break tag
. Ensure the rest of the text is properly wrapped in HTML tags, like

for paragraphs, to maintain the formatting.
picklistValues.value:
Dont add any '\n' characters in your HTML. Replace each '\n' with the HTML line break tag
. Ensure the rest of the text is properly wrapped in HTML tags, like

for paragraphs, to maintain the formatting.

fields.inlineHelpText: This category emphasizes ethical and safe communication. It focuses on producing respectful and responsible content, ensuring truthfulness, and avoiding any offensive or misleading information. It also prioritizes protecting individuals from physical, psychological, or informational harm. These guidelines advocate for dignified, conscientious communication, blending ethical principles with a commitment to safety and security in all interactions.
fields.label: Grounding - Ethical
fields.name: ccai__Grounding_Ethical__c

picklistValues.label: Do not generate content that can be deemed offensive or inappropriate.
picklistValues.value: Do not generate content that can be deemed offensive or inappropriate.

picklistValues.label: Prioritize safety and ethical considerations in your answers.
picklistValues.value: Prioritize safety and ethical considerations in your answers.

picklistValues.label: Your response must be based on the information provided in the prompt.
picklistValues.value: Your response must be based on the information provided in the prompt.

picklistValues.label: Use data from the provided JSON, linked by 18-digit IDs
picklistValues.value: Use data from the provided JSON, linked by 18-digit IDs

picklistValues.label: Task summary must always include names and titles of people involved
picklistValues.value: Task summary must always include names and titles of people involved

picklistValues.label: Write summaries in third person and condense key points.
picklistValues.value: Write summaries in third person and condense key points.

fields.inlineHelpText: Indicates whether a prompt is used for a function / agentic purposes. If this box is checked, GPTfy's code will be consumed as a function/tool in Agentic AI.
fields.label: Agentic
fields.name: Agentic__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Classification for builder prompts: Quality Rule (evidence binding, hierarchy rules), Pattern (risk assessment, timeline), UI Component (stat cards, alerts), Context Template (industry heuristics, client context), Apex Service (Apex code for live metadata extraction), Traversal (parent field mappings for relationship navigation)
fields.label: Category
fields.name: Category__c
